article_title: Missouri Gov. Shows the True Meaning of the 'Show Me State'
article_text:
BY: Follow @cmlee



So that’s why they call Missouri the ‘Show Me State.’

Missouri Gov. Jay Nixon (D) tweeted a picture Tuesday while he was at the polls, encouraging residents of his state to vote, Business Insider reported.

The photo showed Nixon filling out a ballot alongside a woman whose pants were betraying her, exposing several inches of her backside. On Twitter, the thumbnail that appeared in his followers’ feeds only magnified the wardrobe malfunction further.

Tweeting this screenshot, because I’m not entirely sure this just happened. @GovJayNixon pic.twitter.com/avTNOi91LN — Valerie Schremp Hahn (@valeriehahn) November 4, 2014

The tweet has since been deleted.
